title: 02/23/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 02/23/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, the conversation continues surrounding the uncertain futures of

Deshaun Watson, Dak Prescott, and Russell Wilson. Former NFL quarterback, Sean Salisbury

joined the show to talk about the three quarterbacks, specifically focusing on Prescott and how

the Cowboys would be “out of their freaking mind” if they did not attempt to sign the him to a long-term contract. Albert Breer of the MMQB also joined DP and the guys in to give his thoughts on the Carson Wentz trade to the Colts. Did the Eagles try to create a trade market? Breer thinks so. Lastly, NFL Network reporter Michael Silver discussed the future of Wilson as well as other quarterbacks such as Jimmy G and Big Ben.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
